TextLibrary.Text: Khalkus

Lad, listen up! I've got the most amazin' news to tell ye! I was talkin' with the Ogres here in Gluk, which is not easy when ye're a Dwarf, let me tell ye, 'cos they canna figure out where the sound's a-comin' from until they look down and see...

Lad, listen up! I've got the most amazin' news to tell ye! I was talkin' with the Ogres here in Gluk, which is not easy when ye're a Dwarf, let me tell ye, 'cos they canna figure out where the sound's a-comin' from until they look down and see...

Lass, listen up! I've got the most amazin' news to tell ye! I was talkin' with the Ogres here in Gluk, which is not easy when ye're a Dwarf, let me tell ye, 'cos they canna figure out where the sound's a-comin' from until they look down and see...

Lass, listen up! I've got the most amazin' news to tell ye! I was talkin' with the Ogres here in Gluk, which is not easy when ye're a Dwarf, let me tell ye, 'cos they canna figure out where the sound's a-comin' from until they look down and see...
Khalkus? You had some news, remember?
Khalkus? You had some news, remember?
Khalkus? You had some news, remember?
Khalkus? You had some news, remember?
Oh, aye, I did. One o' the Ogres tells me that an Ogre Mage up north of here in Gork has part of the Great Machine! Can ye imagine it? Lost for centuries, an' part of it turns up here in Kor with...

Oh, aye, I did. One o' the Ogres tells me that an Ogre Mage up north of here in Gork has part of the Great Machine! Can ye imagine it? Lost for centuries, an' part of it turns up here in Kor with...
What is this 'Great Machine'?
What is this 'Great Machine'?
What is this 'Great Machine'?
What is this 'Great Machine'?
Ach! I canna believe ye've never heard o' the Great Machine. 'Twas built by the Dwarves long long ago, but lost when Orcs raided the lower halls of Duernoth and...

I can see you're not going to stop talking until we get this piece of machinery. Am I right?
I can see you're not going to stop talking until we get this piece of machinery. Am I right?
I can see you're not going to stop talking until we get this piece of machinery. Am I right?
I can see you're not going to stop talking until we get this piece of machinery. Am I right?
Ach, laddie, if ye could just gaze upon the beauty of this machine, ye'd understand...
Ach, laddie, if ye could just gaze upon the beauty of this machine, ye'd understand...
Ach, lassie, if ye could just gaze upon the beauty of this machine, ye'd understand...
Ach, lassie, if ye could just gaze upon the beauty of this machine, ye'd understand...
Okay, Khalkus. Let's visit this Ogre Mage.
